summary: Hurricane Maria was a powerful storm that caused lots of damage in the Caribbean in 2017. It was the worst hurricane to hit Puerto Rico, with 2,975 deaths. Maria started as a tropical storm on September 16 and quickly got stronger, becoming a Category 5 hurricane. It hit Dominica and Puerto Rico, causing huge destruction. The storm also affected other islands, like Guadeloupe and Martinique. The total damage cost was very high, around $91 billion. Maria was the deadliest hurricane in the Atlantic since 2004 and one of the strongest ever recorded.
title: Hurricane Maria
